snippet.title: CAN YOU SEPARATE THE ART FROM THE ARTIST? (Marilyn Manson, Tim Lambesis, etc)
snippet.description:
Can you separate the art from the artist? It's a tough question with no easy answers, but here's some of what I touch on:
* Tim Lambesis of As I Lay Dying, Louis CK, Chris Brown and other people who have admitted to doing something or been proven guilty
* Unproven but credible allegations such as Marilyn Manson or Dahvie Vanity of Blood On The Dancefloor
* Morrissey, Morgan Wallen, and Corey Taylor's thoughts on "cancel culture"
* Lil Peep and industry enablers
--
🎉 PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/thepunkrockmba
--
🔊 PODCAST (Spotify): https://bit.ly/prmbapodcast

4:44 Warped Tour & Corpse Husband
